mapper.select: select * from chat order by chat_key desc

SELECT c.chat_key, c.user_key, c.chat_title, c.chat_cont, c.chat_hit, c.chat_date, c.chat_update, c.chat_like, c.chat_tag, u.user_id, u.user_pwd, u.user_name, u.user_phone, u.user_email, u.user_addr, u.user_birth, u.user_gender, u.user_join_date, u.user_confirm FROM chat c JOIN users u ON c.user_key = u.user_key WHERE c.chat_key = #{chat_key}
mapper.insert:
select coalesce(max(chat_key), 0) + 1 from chat
insert into chat (chat_key, user_key, chat_title, chat_cont, chat_hit, chat_date, chat_update, chat_like, chat_tag) values (#{chat_key}, #{user_key}, #{chat_title}, #{chat_cont}, 1, sysdate, sysdate, 0, #{chat_tag})
mapper.update: update chat set chat_key = chat_key - 1 where chat_key > #{chat_key}
update chat set chat_hit = chat_hit + 1 where chat_key = #{chat_key}
update chat set chat_title = #{chat_title}, chat_cont = #{chat_cont}, chat_update = sysdate where chat_key = #{chat_key}
update chat set chat_like = chat_like + 1 where chat_key = #{chat_key}
